body.p: Some projects which can be used in neuroConstruct

section.title: Simple single cell
section.p: This simple example is included with the standard distribution to help check that the Java 3D is correctly installed.

img.title: Click to enlarge
img.alt: Screenshot of single cell in neuroConstruct

section.title: Cell packing
section.p: The somas can be placed in a random fashion, packed on top of one another, cubic-close packed, or individually placed in specified locations in 3D.

img.title: Click to enlarge
img.alt: Screenshot of cell packing functionality in neuroConstruct
